entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
